description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2, 3, 5} mod 6.
comments: Each element is coprime to preceding two elements. - _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 12 2001
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,2,-1).
example: After 21 and 23 the next term is 25 as 24 has a common divisor with 21.
prog: (Haskell)a047255 n = a047255_list !! (n-1)a047255_list = 1 : 2 : 3 : 5 : map (+ 6) a047255_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 17 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 15 2001.
